briefdescription.para: enables using uart by setting "en" bit in the control register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: disables using uart by clearing "en" bit in the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: enables using uart RX by setting uart "rxen" bit in the control register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: disables using uart RX by clearing uart "rxen" bit in the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: enables using uart TX by setting uart "txen" bit in the control register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: disables using uart TX by clearing uart "txen" bit in the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: enables loopback (connecting TX to RX signal) by setting "lpen" bit in the control register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: disables loopback (connecting TX to RX signal) by clearing "lpen" bit in the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: enables glitch filter (filter out noise or glitches on the received signal) by setting "gfen" bit in the control register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: disables glitch filter (filter out noise or glitches on the received signal) by clearing "gfen" bit in the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
sets the control register to a certain value where
bit 0: UART enable
bit 1: UART Transmitter enable
bit 2: UART Receiver enable
bit 3: Loopback (connect RX and TX pins together) enable
bit 4: UART Glitch Filer on RX enable

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the control register

briefdescription.para: returns the value of the control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: sets the Data Size (Data word length: 5-9 bits ) by setting the "wlen" field in configuration register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the required data word length

briefdescription.para: sets the "stp2" bit in configuration register (whether the stop boits are two or one)

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
bool value, if "true", the stop bits are two and if "false", the stop bit is one

briefdescription.para: sets the "parity" field in configuration register (could be none, odd, even, sticky 0 or sticky 1)

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
enum parity_type could be "NONE" , "ODD" , "EVEN" , "STICKY_0" , or "STICKY_1"

briefdescription.para: sets the "timeout" field in configuration register which is receiver timeout measured in number of bits at which the timeout flag will be raised

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
timeout bits value

detaileddescription.para:
sets the configuration register to a certain value where
bit 0-3: Data word length: 5-9 bits
bit 4: Two Stop Bits Select
bit 5-7: Parity Type: 000: None, 001: odd, 010: even, 100: Sticky 0, 101: Sticky 1
bit 8-13: Receiver Timeout measured in number of bits

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the configuration register

briefdescription.para: returns the value of the configuration register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: sets the RX FIFO threshold to a certain value at which "RXA" interrupt will be raised

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the required threshold

briefdescription.para: returns the current value of the RX FIFO threshold

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: sets the TX FIFO threshold to a certain value at which "TXB" interrupt will be raised

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the required threshold

briefdescription.para: returns the current value of the TX FIFO threshold

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
sets the FIFO control register to a certain value where
bit 0-3: Transmit FIFO Level Threshold
bit 8-11: Receive FIFO Level Threshold

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the FIFO control register

briefdescription.para: returns the value of the FIFO control register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
returns the value of the FIFO status register where
bit 0-3: Receive FIFO Level
bit 8-11: Transmit FIFO Level

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: sets the matchData to a certain value at which "MATCH" interrupt will be raised

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the required match data

briefdescription.para: returns the value of the match data register

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: returns the current level of the TX FIFO (the number of bytes in the FIFO)

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: returns the current level of the RX FIFO (the number of bytes in the FIFO)

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: sets the prescaler to a certain value where Baud_rate = Bus_Clock_Freq/((Prescaler+1)*16)

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The value of the required prescaler

briefdescription.para: returns the value of the prescaler

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
returns the value of the Raw Interrupt Status Register
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 2 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 3 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.
bit 4 BRK : Line Break; 13 consecutive 0's have been detected on the line.
bit 5 MATCH : the receive data matches the MATCH register.
bit 6 FE : Framing Error, the receiver does not see a "stop" bit at the expected "stop" bit time.
bit 7 PRE : Parity Error; the receiver calculated parity does not match the received one.
bit 8 OR : Overrun; data has been received but the RX FIFO is full.
bit 9 RTO : Receiver Timeout; no data has been received for the time of a specified number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
returns the value of the Masked Interrupt Status Register
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 2 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 3 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.
bit 4 BRK : Line Break; 13 consecutive 0's have been detected on the line.
bit 5 MATCH : the receive data matches the MATCH register.
bit 6 FE : Framing Error, the receiver does not see a "stop" bit at the expected "stop" bit time.
bit 7 PRE : Parity Error; the receiver calculated parity does not match the received one.
bit 8 OR : Overrun; data has been received but the RX FIFO is full.
bit 9 RTO : Receiver Timeout; no data has been received for the time of a specified number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
sets the value of the Interrupts Masking Register; which enable and disables interrupts
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 2 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 3 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.
bit 4 BRK : Line Break; 13 consecutive 0's have been detected on the line.
bit 5 MATCH : the receive data matches the MATCH register.
bit 6 FE : Framing Error, the receiver does not see a "stop" bit at the expected "stop" bit time.
bit 7 PRE : Parity Error; the receiver calculated parity does not match the received one.
bit 8 OR : Overrun; data has been received but the RX FIFO is full.
bit 9 RTO : Receiver Timeout; no data has been received for the time of a specified number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The required mask value

detaileddescription.para:
returns the value of the Interrupts Masking Register; which enable and disables interrupts
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 2 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 3 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.
bit 4 BRK : Line Break; 13 consecutive 0's have been detected on the line.
bit 5 MATCH : the receive data matches the MATCH register.
bit 6 FE : Framing Error, the receiver does not see a "stop" bit at the expected "stop" bit time.
bit 7 PRE : Parity Error; the receiver calculated parity does not match the received one.
bit 8 OR : Overrun; data has been received but the RX FIFO is full.
bit 9 RTO : Receiver Timeout; no data has been received for the time of a specified number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

detaileddescription.para:
sets the value of the Interrupts Clear Register; write 1 to clear the flag
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 2 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 3 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.
bit 4 BRK : Line Break; 13 consecutive 0's have been detected on the line.
bit 5 MATCH : the receive data matches the MATCH register.
bit 6 FE : Framing Error, the receiver does not see a "stop" bit at the expected "stop" bit time.
bit 7 PRE : Parity Error; the receiver calculated parity does not match the received one.
bit 8 OR : Overrun; data has been received but the RX FIFO is full.
bit 9 RTO : Receiver Timeout; no data has been received for the time of a specified number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The required mask value

briefdescription.para: transmit an array of characters through uart

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
An array of characters to send

briefdescription.para: transmit a single character through uart

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.
The character or byte required to send

briefdescription.para: recieve a single character through uart

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of UART registers.

briefdescription.para: C header file for UART APIs which contains the function prototypes.
